sources.title: SILENT HEROES (1913) -- dir. by Thomas Ince
sources.description: SILENT HEROES (1913) Starring: J. Barney Sherry, Tom Chatterton, Estelle Allen, Frank Borzage Directed by Thomas Ince Broncho Motion Picture Company William Thomas Sherman, wts@gunjones.com, http://www.mn-hp.com

metadata.Plot: A young man refuses the call to arms in order that he may stand by his mother. He bears abuse of the community, but after her death, he fights bravely for the South.
metadata.Actors: Tom Chatterton, Estelle Allen, Frank Borzage
